name: Kaomoji Fighters
description:
Enter the Kaomoji Arena with your own custom fighters based on your input!

Who will win?
(ง •_•)ง vs. ╰(￣ω￣ｏ) ?
༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ vs. (✿◕‿◕✿) ?
(☞ﾟヮﾟ)☞ vs. ☜(ﾟヮﾟ☜) ?
Enter the arena and find out!

=== Controls ===
1-3: Fighter 1 Attacks
7-9: Fighter 2 Attacks
Space: Attempt Knockdown Recovery
Escape: Pause/Return to Menu

Notes:
- Over 300 built-in Kaomoji to randomly select from!
- On windows you can press Win + . to input your own Kaomoji, or use your own custom input.
- Each Kaomoji has balanced stats generated based off the input unicode characters. Some fighters deal more damage, while others are more likely to get strong attacks.
- Unfortunately some unicode characters are not supported. If you see a square border try to replace the unicode character with something else.

Software Used:
  - Unity 2019.4
  - Visual Studio 2019
  - Google Fonts
